think_procedure: 1. Identify the knob in question: max_parallel_workers. 2. Determine if this knob has a natural numerical order for its settings. 3. Check if there are any special values (e.g., -1, 0) that, when set, cause the knob to perform a significantly different function than its regular operation. 4. If such special values exist, classify the knob as a 'special knob'. 5. If no such special values exist, classify the knob as a regular numerical knob.
